p:
Beside the cytotoxic activity, toxicity and selectivity towards normal cells are also critical factors in the discovery of new anticancer agents
56 . Accordingly, cytotoxicity of the new reported compounds ( 16â€“ 20) was also evaluated in the current study using the normal human foetal lung fibroblast (MRC-5). The investigation was performed using the MTT assay according to the previous reports
25 . The results were presented in Table 3.
